DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to determine if the investigational drug is effective and safe in individuals with COPD (chronic pulmonary disease)
DOC.brief_title: Study In Subjects With COPD (Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease)
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: Diagnosis of COPD and a history of cigarette smoking. Exclusion criteria: Significant heart or lung disease not associated with COPD. Significant stomach or intestinal disease.
